data_table.description: Menopause, Hormone Replacement and Ovary Removal, Omni 1, cases reviewed through Exam 3

variable.name: IDTYPE
variable.comment: IDTYPE and ID taken together form a unique study participant identification number.

variable.name: STOPAGE
variable.description: Age when periods reported stopped for one year or more
variable.comment: 20 - 29 = Range of values 30 - 39 = Range of values. 40 - 49 = Range of values. 50 - 59 = Range of values. 60 - 69 = Range of values.
variable.value: Periods not stopped or age unknown

variable.name: CAUSE
variable.value: Hormone use before reporting periods stopped

variable.name: EST1
variable.comment: See annotated form for dataset e_exam_ex01_7_0020 for original question configuration (see variable e281).
variable.value: Unknown or did not attend Exam 1

variable.name: EST2
variable.comment: See annotated form for dataset e_exam_ex02_7_0003 for original question configuration (see variable g088).
variable.value: Unknown or did not attend Exam 2

variable.name: EST3
variable.comment: See annotated form for dataset e_exam_ex03_7_0426 for original question configuration (see variable h049).
variable.value: Unknown or did not attend Exam 3

variable.name: SERM1
variable.description: Selective Estrogen Receptor Modulators (SERMs) use at Exam 1
variable.comment: See annotated form for dataset e_exam_ex01_7_0020 to see original question configuration.
variable.value: Unknown or did not attend Exam 1

variable.name: SERM2
variable.description: Selective Estrogen Receptor Modulators (SERMs) use at Exam 2
variable.comment: See annotated form for dataset e_exam_ex02_7_0003 for original question configuration.
variable.value: Unknown or did not attend Exam 2

variable.name: SERM3
variable.description: Selective Estrogen Receptor Modulators (SERMs) use at Exam 3
variable.comment: See annotated form for dataset e_exam_ex03_7_0426 for original question configuration.
variable.value: Unknown or did not attend Exam 3

variable.name: OVREM1
variable.description: Report of number of ovaries removed at Exam 1
variable.comment: This variable represents number of ovaries removed at Exam 1 only. Sum OVREM1, OVREM2 and OVREM3 to get the total number of ovaries removed as of Exam 3.
variable.value: Unknown or did not attend Exam 1

variable.name: OVREM2
variable.description: Report of number of ovaries removed at Exam 2
variable.comment: This variable represents number of ovaries removed at Exam 2 only. Sum OVREM1, OVREM2 and OVREM3 to get the total number of ovaries removed as of Exam 3.
variable.value: Unknown or did not attend Exam 2

variable.name: OVREM3
variable.description: Report of number of ovaries removed at Exam 3
variable.comment: This variable represents number of ovaries removed at Exam 3 only. Sum OVREM1, OVREM2 and OVREM3 to get the total number of ovaries removed as of Exam 3.
variable.value: Unknown or did not attend Exam 3
